sn14.1:4.3: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn14.1:4.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
sn14.1:5.2: Cakkhudhātu rūpadhātu cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, sotadhātu saddadhātu sotaviññāṇadhātu, ghānadhātu gandhadhātu ghānaviññāṇadhātu, jivhādhātu rasadhātu jivhāviññāṇadhātu, kāyadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu kāyaviññāṇadhātu, manodhātu dhammadhātu manoviññāṇadhātu—
